ygData.subject: Where to hunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Lake of Ill Omen rules. I ve only gotten there recently as my 24 enchanter (who made 25 in maybe 6 hours time) and after another hour there, I am about 3/4 of
ygData.messageBody:
Lake of Ill Omen rules. I've only gotten there recently as my 24 enchanter
(who made 25 in maybe 6 hours time) and after another hour there, I am about
3/4 of a bub into the level. Even as a level 16, this place rules. I
would suggest you get a tank of some sort, because they can really help, but
keep the party small. I've been experimenting in Lake with various party
sizes, and two to three people total seems to work best.

-Drelmo Tolfara
24 Enchanter
Xegony Server
